content: rowe 2 sl1 wyf p3 p2tog p1 turn gap p2tog p1 turn this creates a little gap between the last repeat row 1&2 till you have 2 unworked stitch you worked and the ones left stitches after the gap on either side of your unworked needle 4 pattern by wildflower fibercrafts awildflowerslife blog repeat row 1 once more if you can distinguish between the top and bottom of your sock without markers you final row p till 1 st before the gap can leave them out and orient on the p2tog p1 turn transition points instead gusset gusset decreases knit over the heel turn stitches 16/18/20 round 1 k till 3 stitches before the pick up and knit 14/16/18 stitches along marker k2tog k1 sm k to marker the side of the heel flap 1 stitch per slip continue the cable section according to stitch along the edge pick up and knit 1 the chart as you get to it sm k1 ssk k to extra stitch in the gap after the heel flap the end of the round place marker round 2 k to marker sm k to marker knit 28/32/36 making sure to continue continue the cable section according to the cable section according to the chart as the cable chart as you get to it sm k to you get to it the end of the round pick up and knit 1 extra stitch in the gap repeat rounds 1&2 till you re back to your before the heel flap pick up and knit original cast on stitch count of 56/64/72 14/16/18 stitches along the side of the stitches heel flap 1 stitch per slip_stitch along the edge place marker from here on out the beginning of the round will be at the original point again for the duration of the gusset decreases 14/16/18 stitches before the point you re this will be the new beginning of the round on now 5 pattern by wildflower fibercrafts awildflowerslife blog foot you should have 14/16/18 stitches on either side between the marker and the knit in exactly the same way you worked beginning of the round the leg graft these remaining stitches together keep knitting like this until your foot using kitchener stitch measures about 2½ shorter than your desired length continue knitting as you did for the foot so done far but using the ending cable chart enjoy your new twisted hearts socks instead of the main cable chart work like this till you completed the ending cable chart once final round k around toe round 1 k1 ssk k till 3 stitches before the marker k2tog k2 ssk k till 3 stitches before the end of the round k2tog k1 round 2 knit around repeat rounds 1&2 till you have 28/32/36 stitches left in total 6 pattern by wildflower fibercrafts awildflowerslife blog main cable chart main cable chart written instructions 1 p3 k12 p3 2 p2 2/1 rpc 2/2 lc 2/2 rc 2/1 lpc p2 3-5 p2
